name: Be Kind Please Rewind
description:
Be Kind, Please Rewind

Artists: John Paul Martinez (Dartagnan), (NeonAfroSloth)

Programmers: Laurice Thomas (LoriTom), Joaquin Ramirez (Tavera04)

Sound Designers: Andre Abi-Saber (andreabisaber)

Guitar Player: Julio Kappa

Controls WASD and Arrow Keys are for moving and rewinding tapes.

Press E to interact with customers and tapes, which will prompt a directional combo to rewind the tapes.

Make contact with a shelf to store the fixed tape.

How to play:
Manage the video store by rewinding and restocking VHS tapes, and taking care of customers before they get angry and leave.
Rewind VHS tapes by entering the correct button combination, and replace them on the highlighted shelves.
Customers that get too impatient will drop their tapes in a pile which you also must keep from filling up.

If the tape pile gets too high or you miss 3 rewind combos, the game is over.
